result.arabic_text: وَتِلۡكَ عَادٞۖ جَحَدُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَعَصَوۡاْ رُسُلَهُۥ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ
result.translation: 59.Toh Qaad deqsita maray (Nabii Huud mara kinnuk) sinni Rabbih inkittinaanc tascasse astootil koroositey kay farmoytiitih amri ciney kulli kaxxa mariinoliy cirdeynah yaniy cakki cina kataate mara kinni.
